twitch_info.title: I wanna kill the kamilia 3 - Secret 5 - Attempts - PB: Screen 9 of 9 (vid 2)

message.body: If I made this you would have to do an allign pitfall just to trigger the next screen xD
Do you even know what that term means?
Hmmm a pit of spikes you have to fall into/jump out of thats frame perfect
That's not an align dependent jump
That would more-or-less be a v-string
Wrong use of aallign then XD
Where you jump off a very specific pixel
aligns are all about getting as close to spikes as possible
or as far on a block as possible
This only works while on the same ground level
Aligns won't make a difference when falling
Well, they will, but not in your specific case.
My bad got my terms mixed up
Let's say you did a pit fall where you had to jump through a spike afterwards.
Now that could be an align requirement, but only if you needed to get as close to the spike as possible before doing the jump.
and this closeness really only applies horizontally iirc
Ill draw out my awful idea later xD
so vertically it makes no difference
unless you need a specific align to do a tas drop for example
you're really describing a v-string requirement
which is your vertical pixel string
you'll need to study needle quite hard if you want to make a hard jump that isn't impossible.
unless you play a lot of IWBTG fangames, I don't advise that territory.
I,d be testing them extensively myself that for sure xD
If it also turns out to be align dependent, make sure the player can actually grab it.
Oh and during testing, you may touch a wall earlier on that you require for the jump
if that happens, you could make it impossible if you blocked off that wall.
That's if it turns out to be align dependent also tho
I know a guy that could do all the testing for me now that I think of it xP
There is a niche market called L-needle for the kind of stuff you're wanting.
Once I'm good enough to do that kind of stuff, then I'll be ready to test out shit like that.
give me at least a year or two
I don't know why I struggle in the main game
Was gunna say makung it look easy now
let's get some practice in real quick
and then do more attempts for real lel
tfw I'm struggling on this rn when I wasn't earlier
secret 5 is all over the place for me, it really is
Gatta do a little dance xD
I find it so weird I'm failing here now
It's like as if I've never practiced it
you aren't even seeing the skill of someone who cleared it twice in jtool, you aren't even seeing the skill of someone who reached screen 9
when I teleport myselft o the right
I do it first try to the left
now this is a hardcore grind session
I need to get so more consistent at this
I can do right to left, then left to middle
but left to right seems to be the hard part
Bit of work needed on left to right but I know ull get it down
doing the rest right after left to right is harder
almost cleared it in jtool again
I have to master the beginning of this
because of screen 9 requiring this to win
Might be dying my hair for the 1st time xD
I was making a paint bucket joke
if you make straight up brutal needle that's not fun I won't try it even when I get better
time for ppl to get the TASes out
very unsatisfied with my skill rn
this does not reflect someone who spent 10 hours
now we know what grind hell looks like
the final step in learning how to do it
Left side just isnt your friend today :P
I can't clear today unless it is
it's looking like clearing today is off the menu
Tfw era makes it to the right side
I am actually making it to right sid enow
now you're getting a better reflection of my skill
Tfw eradem realizes he,s progressing lul
now you're seeing my screen 9 skill
apparently nearly spent an hour in jtool
the other reaosn this first jump is hard
is it varies by a ton of different variables
where you are in the 16 px gap, the precise movements
and the precise shift key presses
it looks so good when you make it though.
it's literally just left to right
now this is what I call a hardcore training session lmao
Time to bust out a water totem and get drawing :P
Well wasnt supposed to be a face but /shrug
guy tower and tempest are nothing compared to this
this is the two difficult sides of both combined into one package
someone did tas a buffed version of this
the problem with left to right is it can wig you out
and make right to left harder
Kinda like playing right side in a fighter
it's the same controls but reversed
Loooool my friend drops off a bunch of hair dye dyes his hair and the result is priceless
Sends me a pick of his too bright blue hair
Your getting put on pc xD
I should open this on all my screens XD
I can just imagine that friend of yours trying to claim they can do this.
ya he still hasnt beaten the Impossible game so he's talking a bunch of crap :P
you would breeze though it in 20mins
sadly took me a year to get them all down and there easymode
isn't that the world record tho?
It would take me a little while to clear that game tbh
I still run into issues in the upside down lvl
just a reaction game though doesnt require real skill like these
you don't mean world's hardest game
all of it in practice as well for completion
and that was on the PS3
woulda rocked my world if you hadnt played it and were this good at these
I cleared a fangame version of it that was far harder tan the original
imagine flippingu pside down and right sideup constantly in the worst parts
there was that one with the portals on steam never got into it seemed super popular
Today's version of it is geometry dash
I couldnt get into it either
welp clicked more colors to see what that brings me and twitch is like looks like your signing in from a new device like ok same computer for 2 years but ok
oh there's actually a reason for that
The DNS Resolver Cache holds the data for Twitch.
If you flush it, then twitch is logged out.
and annoying if you don't have your phone handy
since you have to verify with phone to stream
I just wanted a color changing white and red name tag xD
I feel like I've reached the highest PB I can get tonight lmao
these 1st few stages are just to bring your skill down im thinking
like ooo simple jumps to not so simple jumps
They're here to just kill you so you don't progress
early in the day I can do it without thinking
the moving grid in the background probly don't help xD
It's really easy to ignore actually.
I thought u had it that time ngl
easy to die to a lot
without screen 6, the grind would be a lot smoother.
you get screen 5 with the 16px which is kinda monka
and then you get screen 6 which is absolutely retarded
theres a checkpoint after this right? :P
once you do all 9 screens and leave via the exit portal
you go straight to a save point and the secret is done
making sure its not a do secret to do boss if you fail do it again thing xD
if it were the creator has more evil moments than me :P
gates!! gates!! we need more gates more spikes he's doing it!! XD
the gates aren't even the problem
It's that one fucking jump tbh
It always has been that jump
ever since I started grinding this
hmmm Procedurally generated fan game.... HMMM
I think there has been a game like that
but not different every death, just different every screen.
oh and that game had lives iirc
hello darkness my old friend I've come to meet with you again teach me way to not be bad making traps is I have XD
and ikr lives system in fangames = awful
you just dont add lives to a fangame
it goes against the entire nature of IWBTG and its fangames to do so tbh
and the only reason arcade games have a life counter is because you would have to pay money for each game over
so those actually had a reason
also I don't know why I keep failing to the last jump of screen 6 now but it is what it is
Well, we all know luck isn't something I usually have.
make up with the gypsi you angered and youll get your luck back XP
I cant find the one that cursed me lol
how do I even fail this
>in jtool does it all the time
I usually followe iwbtg fangame streamers as a give-back for their persistance
I've actually cleared secret 5, 2 times in jtool
I just like watching the impossible or at least for me xD
I tried kamilia 3 once before but got stuck on the first boss
im able to get to that final avoidence attack but the curving just gets unreadable lol
ah, that. Yeah, you need a fair bit of avoidance practice to do it really.
most avoidences I've played dont really have curving attacks
and given boss rush is a thing
especially ones that just change curve in the air
That reminds me of piano's curving.
oh yeah, that's right. I got all crystals and achievements and secrets I can get so far
guy tower and tempest crystals were
It's because I done them, that I know I can do Secret 5.
and jtool has proved to me I can do Secret 5 on many occasion
from what I can tell a lot of crystals are more hidden than skill based
except for guy tower and tempest
Guy tower is almost the entirety of stage 3 final screen deathless
and tempest is much the same
guy tower crystal took me like
skipping saves in a game like this
and yep, you have to skip
and not to mention you have to do the jump refresher save
I was thinking it was like 1 or 2
and it's a very big screen
I've done a lot of insane shit to get where I am now xd
all that for an optional crystal
yeah I can show you on the practice tool real quick if you like
I run a separate save file for practice.
you can also look up my video as well if you want to
last one made it to my top 5's from era
here you go, guy tower crystal
man, gotta love having no issues in jtool but in-game getting nowhere
I mean this is all good practice
I think I should continue this tomorrow, seeing as any further grinding is clearly getting me nowhere tonight.
I did reach screen 9 once today
so I'm pretty happy with that
imma play some decisive taisa tbh
Only because I know I've reached the end of my grinds for today.
always forget how nuts he is in this

cause tomorrow is the final buffer day I have to meet my goal with that shit existing
unless I do godlike at the bosses coming up
I couldn't do that back in the day
I did a cancel in and jump cancel out
that wall on the right looks friendly
you would make this hell wouldn't you Kinkert
but also think they did that for me xD
I mean an angry atking spike in the middle would do it
I'm surprised I can even do this
I just wait for the ayyy cause im 20secs behind XD
reminds me of meatboy thats for sure
now that I think of it I think The Guy is a playable character you can unlock
25c per death and you owe more than America owes china XD

new machine will be put in its place
I would be the owner playing the machine nobody dared to touch
reminds me of The Last Starfighter
that and Flight of the Navigator were great oldies now I gatta watch em again
I'm so close to the end
This is the romroom secret btw
at least K3 platforming has class
k3 may be dumb but its a sensible dumb
really I have to remember to shoot the save as I fall as well
would make one of the spikes shoot out to make it harder and also easier
or make one of them fake
the first one in this case would b eimpossible
the second one would be nice
maybe even a fake block you could shoot to get a better position idk :P
block beside the save or something so you could finish and also the opening would lead to secret X
This is part 1 of the secret
you aren't actually intended to go back through this
when you originally go in here you have dotkid
figured as much with the small hole
this entire segment I'm doing now is usually dotkid done
to enter the portal to another level
but you have to do it with regular Kid to get the secret
makes a lot more sense as dotkid
worst part is the fact I got to catch the save as I fall
and not save lock myself into a spike
this is why I quit classic back inthe day
this is I wanna Classic btw
oh no you also have to aim
shoot the save while you're falling but timed
someone in Pakistan is trying to sign into my psn smh
they locked my account now I have a mess to clean up
god needle in this engine is terrible lmao
in a normal engine this would be fine
and all this in this engine?
I think that'll do me for tonight honestly
